title: Ticket #4706: Clarify how to disable collector reports
description:
A recent thread on condor-users revealed confusion about how to disable the collector reporting to UW-Madison.

To address this, we should update the website privacy policy page to state directly on that page how to disable the reports, future-proof any hyperlinks on the privacy policy page, and update the example of information that is sent. In addition, the annotated example config file ( /src/condor_examples/condor_config.annotated ) should be updated to help admins disable this behavior without digging around in the Manual.
